name: custom-sidebar
description: Custom HACS plugin that allows you to rearrange, hide, and add menu items to Home Assistant's sidebar
author: ElChiniNet

scripts.test:ci: pnpm test:clean && pnpm demo && pnpm start:playwright && pnpm stop:ha
scripts.test:tag: pnpm reset:ha && pnpm test:clean && pnpm demo && pnpm tag:playwright && pnpm stop:ha
scripts.test:all: pnpm lint && pnpm test:ts && pnpm test:ci
scripts.start:playwright: docker run --rm --network host --add-host host.docker.internal:host-gateway -v $(pwd):/$(pwd)/ -w $(pwd) -i mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v$npm_package_devDependencies__playwright_test-jammy sh -c "npx playwright test"
scripts.tag:playwright: docker run --rm --network host --add-host host.docker.internal:host-gateway -v $(pwd):/$(pwd)/ -w $(pwd) -i mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v$npm_package_devDependencies__playwright_test-jammy sh -c "npx playwright test --grep @testing"
